lead_paragraph: The lawyers for Jill and Scott Kelley broke ties with them, and Ms. Kelley said that she has since difficulty finding new representation for the case.

headline.print_headline: Couple Linked to Petraeus Inquiry Drops Suit Against Government
headline.main: Couple Linked to Petraeus Inquiry Drops Suit Against Government

snippet: The lawyers for Jill and Scott Kelley broke ties with them, and Ms. Kelley said that she has since difficulty finding new representation for the case.
abstract: Jill and Scott Kelley of Florida announce termination of lawsuit seeking damages against federal government; suit claimed couple's identities had been inappropriately disclosed during FBI investigation concerning David H Petraeus during his tenure as head of Central Intelligence Agency.
